message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me halfway and consider a price of $14,000?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $14,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value and I'm keen to see it in good hands.

Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to make a counteroffer of $16,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring me.
